Notice:

Water Bills are due by the 10th of each month.  If you did not receive your bill, call City Hall at 979-793-4253 to get your bill amount.     |     View the [2025 Hurricane Preparedness Guide](https://www.cityofneedville.com/news/2025-hurricane-preparedness-guide)
for the Houston-Galveston Region.     |     Water Bills are due by the 10th of each month.  If you did not receive your bill, call City Hall at 979-793-4253 to get your bill amount.     |     View the [2025 Hurricane Preparedness Guide](https://www.cityofneedville.com/news/2025-hurricane-preparedness-guide)
for the Houston-Galveston Region.

Departments

Municipal Court
===============

Municipal Court Information

---

\*View all Municipal Court information in the dropdowns below\*

* Pay Tickets & Make Court Payments
  ---------------------------------

  The City of Needville Municipal Court accepts payments in cash or money order.

    

  You may mail in payments to the court in the form of money orders made payable to City of Needville at the following address:

    

  City of Needville Municipal Court

  P.O. Box 527

  Needville, Tx. 77461
* Municipal Court Administration
  ------------------------------

  Judges: Michael Cody Moore

    

  Court Clerk: **[court@cityofneedville.com](mailto:court@cityofneedville.com)**
* Municipal Court Dates
  ---------------------

  View upcoming Municipal Court dates on our Calendar: **[View Calendar](https://www.cityofneedville.com/calendar)**

    

  Download a PDF of all upcoming Municipal Court dates: **[Download PDF](https://irp.cdn-website.com/b127c118/files/uploaded/2025_MUNICIPAL_COURT_DATES.pdf)**
* Municipal Court Location
  ------------------------

  The City of Needville Municipal Court is located inside City Hall at 9022 Main Needville, TX 77461

    

  If you have any questions about your court date, you must contact the court by phone. It is Important to notify the court of contact information changes so we may keep our records up to date.

    

  **[Click here for directions](https://www.google.com/maps/dir//city+of+needvile+city+hall/data=!4m6!4m5!1m1!4e2!1m2!1m1!1s0x8641043db3fba951:0x55197f18a1ff78d0?sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjN0Kjb0MiCAxX6k2oFHbZJA7UQ9Rd6BAhKEAA)**
* Contact the Municipal Court
  ---------------------------

  The Municipal Court can be contacted:

    

  Monday - Friday, 9:00 AM - 5:00 PM

    

  Phone - **[979-793-4253](tel:979-793-4253)**

  Fax - 979-793-6055
* Courtroom Rules & Attire
  ------------------------

  Violations of any of the following may result in the defendant being removed from the courtroom and the case being reset:

  + No smoking or use of tobacco products
  + No loud noises or talking
  + No weapons of any type
  + No cell phones
  + No unattended or unruly children
  + No food, beverages, or chewing gum
  + No approaching the judge’s bench unless directed to do so
  + No inappropriate attire
  + No hats, caps or bandanas
  + No recording devices of any kind
